title: Sample, ca. 1945
medium:
Medium: cotton, synthetic
Technique: weft-faced plain weave
dimensions:
H x W (sample): 22.2 x 20 cm (8 3/4 x 7 7/8 in.)
H x W (card): 31.8 x 27.9 cm (12 1/2 x 11 in.)
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
description: Woven sample mounted to a cardboard card with notations by the designer. Balanced plaid in white, black and rose with horizontal stripes of white novelty yarn. Warp has stripes of rose four-ply cotton and white two-ply synthetic yarns. Weft has bands of paired shiny black cellophane; red, pink and white yarns, and textured white woven braid. The white warps operate singly and the rose warps are alternately paired and unpaired.
